keyMoments.title: Robin Appears on Going Merry
keyMoments.description: Robin emerges from inside the Going Merry as a stowaway, surprising all the crew members.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Robin's dramatic entrance as she prepares to join the Straw Hat crew.

keyMoments.title: Robin Joins the Straw Hat Pirates
keyMoments.description: Robin convinces the crew to let her join by explaining that Luffy saved her life against her wishes and she has nowhere else to go. Luffy accepts her immediately.
keyMoments.significance: One of the most pivotal moments in One Piece - Robin officially becomes the seventh Straw Hat crew member.
keyMoments.quote: You forced me to live. You have to take responsibility.

keyMoments.title: Robin Bribes Nami
keyMoments.description: Robin wins Nami's approval by offering her jewels and gems.
keyMoments.significance: Begins the relationship between the two main female crew members and showcases Robin's understanding of people.

keyMoments.title: Robin's 20-Year Search Revealed
keyMoments.description: Robin reveals she has spent 20 years searching for the Rio Poneglyph to uncover the true history of the world.
keyMoments.significance: First mention of Robin's life goal, setting up one of the series' major plot threads.

bounties.reason: Former Baroque Works vice president and wanted since childhood for knowledge of Poneglyphs

relationships.description: Robin joins Luffy's crew after he saved her life in Arabasta. She sees him as the captain who gave her a reason to live.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin convinces Luffy to let her join the crew by claiming he must take responsibility for saving her.

relationships.description: Robin befriends Nami by bribing her with treasure, beginning their relationship as the two main female crew members.

evolutionMoments.description: Robin wins Nami over by giving her jewels and gems.

relationships.description: Zoro remains suspicious of Robin's intentions, though he is briefly disarmed by her cheerfulness.

evolutionMoments.description: Unlike other crew members, Zoro maintains his wariness of Robin despite her joining the crew.

relationships.description: Sanji immediately accepts Robin because she is a woman, showing his typical behavior toward female crew members.

evolutionMoments.description: Sanji instantly welcomes Robin to the crew without any hesitation.

relationships.description: Usopp attempts to interrogate Robin but ends up terrified of her mysterious demeanor.

evolutionMoments.description: Usopp fails to interrogate Robin and becomes frightened by her presence.

reveals.information: Officially joins the Straw Hat Pirates as the seventh member and archaeologist
Has spent 20 years searching for the Rio Poneglyph to uncover true history
Has nowhere else to go after Baroque Works' defeat

keyMoments.title: Potsun Debut
keyMoments.description: Dr. Potsun appears as an Arabasta doctor who runs an isolated clinic in the desert and treated Pell's injuries.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces the character responsible for saving Pell's life after his heroic sacrifice.

relationships.description: Potsun treated Pell's injuries after he survived the bomb explosion.

evolutionMoments.description: Potsun saves Pell's life and nurses him back to health at his remote desert clinic.

reveals.information: Runs an isolated medical clinic in the Arabasta desert
Treated Pell after the bomb explosion

keyMoments.title: Pell's Miraculous Survival Revealed
keyMoments.description: Pell is shown alive, having survived the massive bomb explosion. He approaches his own grave with disturbed astonishment.
keyMoments.significance: Provides closure to Pell's sacrifice and became a memorable moment for fans, confirming his survival despite impossible odds.

reveals.information: Survived the bomb explosion and was treated by Dr. Potsun
